name: TRUTH.нет
description:
Authoritarian state media moderation.

Master the art of duality and choose, which posts and comments to approve and which to deny, while trying to maintain order in your state. Balance the language of users to suit or anger the supreme leader, fuel or suppress peasant uprising, spend or keep those Crypto kopeks in the bank and avoid or embrace foreign interference. The system is in your hands!

Submission for Global Game Jam 2022  /  theme - duality

Controls:

  • Mouse - move the cursor
  • Mouse button left - press buttons
  • Text keys - write text

Credits: 

  • Game design & art - Povilas Vincentas Jankunas
  • Sound design & music - Ignas Ceponis
  • Frontend programming - Daumantas Simkus
  • Backend programming - Karolis Dijokas
  • Backend programming - Lukasz Michniewicz
